• Psychological factors: high levels
of impulsivity and antagonism,
hypersensitivity to rejection or
insult, poor frustration tolerance
and maladaptive coping skills may
contribute to aggression and rage.
CAUTION 
• People with mental illness or
intellectual disability may also have
physical health conditions, trauma
or
 substance misuse.
